WorkTypeGroup.name: WorkTypeGroup
WorkTypeGroup.description: Represents a grouping of work types used to categorize types of appointments available in Salesforce Scheduler.

AdditionalInformation.description: Additional information about the types of appointments this work type group represents.

Description.description: A description of this work type group.

GroupType.description: The category of this work type group. Possible values are: Defaultâ€”A non-capacity group of work types used in Salesforce Scheduler.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether this work type group can be used for appointment scheduling.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time that the current user last viewed a record related to this object.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this object.

Name.description: The name of this work type group.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who created this record.
